value.title: How to return 0 instead of BLANK in DAX
value.excerpt: How to force a measure to return zero instead of blank, in order to highlight combinations of attributes with no data.  Article and download: https://sql.bi/713576?aff=yt  How to learn DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/guides/dax/?aff=yt The definitive guide to DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/books/the-definitive-guide-to-dax-2nd-edition/?aff=yt

value.title: Working below a DAX formula’s granularity

value.title: Consume data with Power BI
value.excerpt: Do you want to make business decisions backed by data? Learn how to do that in Power BI. Learn to work in Power BI to review and interact with this content to make business decisions.

topItems.title: Explore what Power BI can do for you
topItems.excerpt: As a consumer, you'll work in the Power BI service to review and interact with content that has been shared with you. This module provides the foundational information that you need to work effectively in the Power BI service.

topItems.title: Analyze data with Power BI
topItems.excerpt: This module goes beyond viewing and exploring your content and explains how to interact with it by working with reports and dashboards to uncover and share new business insights.

topItems.title: Get to your data on the go with the Power BI Mobile apps
topItems.excerpt: As a consumer, you'll use the Power BI mobile app to review and interact with the content that is available to you in the Power BI service while you're on the go. This module provides the information that you need to work effectively with the Power BI mobile apps.

value.title: Implement advanced data visualization techniques by using Power BI
value.excerpt: Implement advanced data visualization techniques by using Power BI

topItems.title: Understand advanced data visualization concepts
topItems.excerpt: Create cohesive, inclusive, and efficient Power BI reports to effectively communicate results.

topItems.title: Monitor data in real-time with Power BI
topItems.excerpt: Describe real-time analytics in Power BI using automatic page refresh, real-time dashboards, and auto-refresh in paginated reports.

topItems.title: Create paginated reports
topItems.excerpt: Paginated reports allow report developers to create Power BI artifacts that have tightly controlled rendering requirements. Paginated reports are ideal for creating sales invoices, receipts, purchase orders, and tabular data. This module will teach you how to create reports, add parameters, and work with tables and charts in paginated reports.

value.title: Introduction to data analytics on Azure
value.excerpt: Introduction to data analytics on Azure

topItems.title: Explore Azure data services for modern analytics
topItems.excerpt: Understand analytics solutions in the Azure data ecosystem. Explore the architecture of a scalable analytics solution to meet business needs.

topItems.title: Understand concepts of data analytics
topItems.excerpt: Explore key concepts of data analytics, including types of analytics, data, and storage. Explore the analytics process and tools used to discover insights.

topItems.title: Explore data analytics at scale
topItems.excerpt: Describe data analytics at scale and understand the roles of a data team. Learn about the responsibilities of an enterprise data analyst and what tools are available to build scalable solutions.

value.title: Becoming a solution architect for Dynamics 365 and Power Platform
value.excerpt: Learn how to become a solution architect.

value.title: Build systems of insights for enterprise scale with Power BI and Azure
value.excerpt: Build systems of insights for enterprise scale with Power BI and Azure

value.title: Add measures to Power BI Desktop models
value.excerpt: In this module, you'll learn how to work with implicit and explicit measures. You'll start by creating simple measures, which summarize a single column or table. Then, you'll create more complex measures based on other measures in the model. Additionally, you'll learn about the similarities of, and differences between, a calculated column and a measure.

value.title: Use DAX iterator functions in Power BI Desktop models
value.excerpt: By the end of this module, you'll learn about what the family of iterator functions can do and how to use them in your DAX calculations. Calculations will include custom summarizations, ranking, and concatenation.

value.title: Discover customer needs as a Solution Architect for Dynamics 365 and Power Platform
value.excerpt: Learn how to ask customers questions about their business processes and feature requirements to create a viable solution.

value.title: Explore Azure data services for modern analytics
value.excerpt: Understand analytics solutions in the Azure data ecosystem. Explore the architecture of a scalable analytics solution to meet business needs.

value.title: Explore data analytics at scale
value.excerpt: Describe data analytics at scale and understand the roles of a data team. Learn about the responsibilities of an enterprise data analyst and what tools are available to build scalable solutions.

value.title: Power Platform - Introduction, business value, and demos
value.excerpt: Explore the capabilities of Power Platform applications, as seen in demonstrations and customer case studies.

value.title: Get to your data on the go with the Power BI Mobile apps
value.excerpt: As a consumer, you'll use the Power BI mobile app to review and interact with the content that is available to you in the Power BI service while you're on the go. This module provides the information that you need to work effectively with the Power BI mobile apps.

value.title: Monitor data in real-time with Power BI
value.excerpt: Describe real-time analytics in Power BI using automatic page refresh, real-time dashboards, and auto-refresh in paginated reports.

value.title: Monitor and audit usage
value.excerpt: Learn how to use activity logs and auditing with Power BI to monitor and inspect user activity in a Power BI environment.

value.title: Structure analytical report designs in Power BI
value.excerpt: Designing an analytical report involves understanding the requirements and its audience. However, designing a compelling analytical report requires understanding the automatic and unconscious processes that occur when report consumers comprehend what they see. When you have the knowledge of how to structure and apply report design principles, you can raise the level of your report designs to produce relevant, intuitive, and visually pleasing experiences for your report consumers.

value.title: Enhance Power BI report designs for the user interface
value.excerpt: Designing the user interface (UI) is about how reports are consumed, including the appearance and behavior of them, and it is the final report development stage.

value.title: Propose a solution as a Solution Architect for Power Platform and Dynamics 365
value.excerpt: Learn how to propose a solution.

value.title: Understand advanced data visualization concepts
value.excerpt: Create cohesive, inclusive, and efficient Power BI reports to effectively communicate results.

value.title: Understand concepts of data analytics
value.excerpt: Explore key concepts of data analytics, including types of analytics, data, and storage. Explore the analytics process and tools used to discover insights.

value.title: Use tools to optimize Power BI performance
value.excerpt: Use tools to develop, manage, and optimize Power BI data model and DAX query performance.

value.title: Visualize real-time data with Azure Stream Analytics and Power BI
value.excerpt: By combining the stream processing capabilities of Azure Stream Analytics and the data visualization capabilities of Microsoft Power BI, you can create real-time data dashboards.

value.title: Append and Merge Tables in Power BI
value.excerpt: Learn how to quickly merge and append tables using the query editior in Power BI. Build models with multiple data sources. Contact me on LinkedIn: www.linkedin.com/in/gaelimholland
